AI
Interface ControllableUnit

All Known Implementing Classes:
JAIBuilder, JAIControllable, JAIKiller
public interface ControllableUnit

AI Classes that implement this interface will be considered controllable by either a Computer or Human opponent.

Author:
Ciobanu Alexander
